parent_collections.title: A RAB7A Phosphoswitch Coordinates Rubicon Homology Protein Regulation of PINK1/Parkin-Dependent Mitophagy - protocols

steps.step:
{"blocks":[{"key":"en55t","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ca0fr","text":"Day 0: Thaw fresh cryovial of cells to
be transduced","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":52}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"o3fg","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ap0ji","text":"Thaw ~ 1 week prior to planned transduction day, use
low passage number if possible. Aim for cells to be 80% confluent on day of transduction.
Recommend seeding four wells of a 12-well plate (100,000 cells/well) the day
before transduction (after collecting virus).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"44qo5","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8s79g","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3sakl","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7nn2l","text":"Day 1: HEK293T Transfection","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ab3d3","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"61bch","text":"     
Prepare 2 80% confluent 10 cm plates of
HEK293T for transfection","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"des56","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cv496","text":"     
Prepare 3 mL of warm Opti-mem solution.
Add 10 µg of retro/lentiviral transfection plasmid, 10 µg VSV-G plasmid, and 10
µg pCMV-MLV (if retroviral)[DT1] [DT2] or 10 µg pCMV R8.74 (if lentiviral)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":153,"length":5},{"key":1,"offset":159,"length":5}],"data":{}},{"key":"et2bh","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1f79k","text":"     
Add 90 µL of LT-1 reagent and swirl.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a4iii","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bl6t8","text":"     
Incubate at room temperature for 15
minutes.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fslu7","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2mqti","text":"     
Add 1.5 mL dropwise to each 10 cm
HEK293T plate.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d4mo6","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6f6qh","text":"     
Incubate for 3 days in incubator before
harvesting viral particles. If a fluorescent marker was included, it should
begin to be visible on days 1,2 post transfection.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6gccl","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"567r2","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bfr0v","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4irh5","text":"SAFETY: After
this point all media and plasticware is to be treated as potentially containing
viral particles. Decontaminate using 10% bleach for 10 minutes before
discarding as red bag waste. Rinse pipettes with 10% bleach before discarding
as biohazard waste.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"813mq","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9a458","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2gn9a","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fo0m7","text":"Day 4: Harvest viral particles","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":30}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3j3kv","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b1ikc","text":"     
Collect media from both HEK293T plates,
combine into one 20 mL portion in a 50 mL falcon tube. Bleach and discard used
HEK293T plate.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"djukp","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"af280","text":"     
Spin 50 mL tube containing harvested
viral particles in Sorvall for 2 min at 2,000 rpm[DT3] [DT4] to clarify media and pellet stray cells","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":92,"length":5},{"key":3,"offset":98,"length":5}],"data":{}},{"key":"4bei","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ao6tq","text":"     
Aspirate off media without disturbing
pellet.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9kllg","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2nvhc","text":"     
Add 6 mL Lenti-X concentrator solution
to 18 mL of recovered media (concentrator is 4x). Invert to mix.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ekecg","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fjmgi","text":"     
Incubate in refrigerator 1 H – O/N[DT5] ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":40,"length":5}],"data":{}},{"key":"aks0h","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8e8e3","text":"     
Spin 50 mL conical containing viral
particles in centrifuge at 1,500 rcf for 45 min","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ck7cr","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9d8s9","text":"     
Remove 2 mL of supernatant from top of
pelleted solution and save.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d9dh5","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f0oa1","text":"     
Aspirate off remaining media to recover
viral pellet. Bleach excess media.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bvvs3","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1fmo0","text":"     
Resuspend retro/lenti pellet in 2 mL of
saved medium.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4hc03","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"k7u6","text":"  
Titrate concentrated retro/lenti
solution into prepared 12-well containing target cells. Recommend
100-200-400-800 µL titration for 4 total attempts at transfection. Typically
400 or 800 uL will yield ~100% transfection efficiency","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"gocg","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"68bno","text":"  
Return 12-well plate containing
transduced cells to incubator.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6bgr8","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"305h8","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ka84","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ephnh","text":"Day 5: Check on
transduction","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2rnb1","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9foak","text":"     
May be able to see fluorescence today.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1eoo1","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"flkik","text":"     
Swap media to fresh.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6upoj","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b5pmi","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5vntj","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fv9ki","text":"Day 6-7: Check on
transduction","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":30}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"elgvi","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ss","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a6b38","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8fs9e","text":"Day 8-:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2qmpc","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"99bi0","text":"     
Allow cells to grow until almost
confluent on 12-well plate. Trypsinize and replate in a 6-well, allow to grow
until confluent, then replate in a 10 cm plate.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"vp9r","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"erl30","text":"     
Split into two 10 cm plates, Freeze one
plate down into 4 cryovials the next day to save progress. Label with estimated
transduction efficiency if able to measure.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"23cgj","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cg8bc","text":"     
Take other plate and select with
antibiotics if able to/necessary, or clonally isolate populations if able
to/necessary.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2r89r","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5g6ep","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"buih1","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9otig","text":"





","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ghvu","text":"

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D03DABBE800711EEA1FC0A58A9FEAC02","url":"#_msocom_1"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D03DABBE800711EEA1FC0A58A9FEAC02","url":"#_msocom_2"}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D03DABBE800711EEA1FC0A58A9FEAC02","url":"#_msocom_3"}},"3":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D03DABBE800711EEA1FC0A58A9FEAC02","url":"#_msocom_4"}},"4":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D03DABBE800711EEA1FC0A58A9FEAC02","url":"#_msocom_5"}}}}
